entity.caption: Source
entity.name: Source
entity.definition: Source systems that provide data to the warehouse.

attribute.caption: Source Name
attribute.name: Source .
attribute.definition: Name of the source system

attribute.caption: Source Code
attribute.name: Source .
attribute.definition: Code representing the Source.

attribute.caption: Source Desc
attribute.name: Source .
attribute.definition: Name of the Source.

attribute.caption: Currency Code
attribute.name: Currency .
attribute.definition: ISO code representing the Currency.

attribute.caption: Currency Name
attribute.name: Currency .
attribute.definition: Name of the Currency.

attribute.caption: Currency Symbol
attribute.name: Currency Symbol
attribute.definition: Symbol used to represent the currency.

attribute.caption: State Code
attribute.name: State .
attribute.definition: ISO code representing the state.

attribute.caption: Country Code
attribute.name: Country .
attribute.definition: ISO code representing the country.

attribute.caption: State Name
attribute.name: State .
attribute.definition: Name of the State.

attribute.caption: Country Description
attribute.name: Country .
attribute.definition: Description of the Country.

attribute.caption: Country Code
attribute.name: Country .
attribute.definition: ISO code representing the country.

attribute.caption: Country Name
attribute.name: Country .
attribute.definition: Name of the country.

attribute.caption: World Subregion Description
attribute.name: World Subregion .
attribute.definition: Description of the subregion of the world in which the country resides.

attribute.caption: World Region Description
attribute.name: World Region .
attribute.definition: Description of the region of the world in which the country resides.

entity.caption: Legal Entity
entity.name: Customer
entity.definition: Organization or individual that has ever placed a sales order.

attribute.caption: Customer Name
attribute.name: Customer Legal .
attribute.definition: Name of the Customer organization.

attribute.caption: Parent Organization Name
attribute.name: Parent Organization .
attribute.definition: Name of a parent organization, often owning multiple Customers.

attribute.caption: Customer Number
attribute.name: Customer .
attribute.definition: Identifier of the Customer created by internal systems. Not necessarily unique.

attribute.caption: Internal Risk Score
attribute.name: Risk Score .
attribute.definition: Rating of risk that the Customer will pay invoices by the specified term. Higher score indicates greater risk.

attribute.caption: Customer Name
attribute.name: Customer .
attribute.definition: Name of the Customer.

attribute.caption: Customer Number
attribute.name: Customer .
attribute.definition: Customer number in its parent system.

attribute.caption: Customer Type Name
attribute.name: Customer Type .
attribute.definition: Name of the Customer Type.

attribute.caption: Customer Type Code
attribute.name: Customer Type .
attribute.definition: Code representing the Customer Type.

attribute.caption: Legal Entity Name
attribute.name: Legal Entity .
attribute.definition: Name of the legal entity organization.

attribute.caption: Legal Entity Code
attribute.name: Legal Entity .
attribute.definition: Code representing the legal entity

entity.caption: Legal Entity Holiday
entity.definition: Holiday dates specified for a legal entity.

attribute.caption: Holiday Date
attribute.definition: Date on which a holiday occurs for the legal entity.

attribute.caption: Holiday Name
attribute.name: Holiday .
attribute.definition: Name of the holiday.

entity.caption: Legal Entity Fiscal Period
entity.name: Legal Entity Fiscal Period
entity.definition: Holiday dates specified for a legal entity.

attribute.caption: Fiscal Year
attribute.definition: Fiscal year corresponding to the legal entity.

attribute.caption: Fiscal Period Of Year
attribute.name: Fiscal Period Of Year .
attribute.definition: Index from 1..n where (n) is the number of periods in a Fiscal Year.

attribute.caption: Begin Fiscal Period Date
attribute.name: Begin Fiscal Period .
attribute.definition: Date of the first day in the corresponding fiscal period.

attribute.caption: End Fiscal Period Date
attribute.name: End Fiscal Period .
attribute.definition: Date of the last day in the corresponding fiscal period.

attribute.caption: Display Month of Year
attribute.name: Display Month of Year
attribute.definition: Index of the calendar month (1..12) for the month used in the fiscal period label.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Date
attribute.name: Sales Order .
attribute.definition: Date on which the sales order is booked.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Number
attribute.name: Sales Order .
attribute.definition: Sales Order number in its parent system.

attribute.caption: Tax Amount
attribute.name: Tax .
attribute.definition: Tax attributed to the sales order.

attribute.caption: Freight Amount
attribute.name: Freight .
attribute.definition: Freight attributed to the sales order.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Line Description
attribute.name: Sales Order Line .
attribute.definition: Description of the line, often a product description.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Line Index
attribute.name: Sales Order Line .
attribute.definition: Integer index of the line as ordered in the sales order.

attribute.caption: Sale Item Unit Quantity
attribute.name: Item Unit .
attribute.definition: Number of units.

attribute.caption: Sales
attribute.name: Sale .
attribute.definition: Sales attributed to the line.

attribute.caption: Standard Cost
attribute.name: Standard Cost .
attribute.definition: Standard cost attributed to the line.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Line Status Description
attribute.name: Sales Order Line Status .
attribute.definition: Name of the Sales Order Line Status.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Line Status Code
attribute.name: Sales Order Line Status .
attribute.definition: Code representing the Sales Order Line Status.

entity.caption: Sales Order Line Status History
entity.name: Sales Order Line Status .
entity.definition: Holiday dates specified for a legal entity.

attribute.caption: Status Date
attribute.name: Status .
attribute.definition: Date for which the sales order line status is specified.

attribute.caption: Sales Order Line Status
attribute.name: Sales Order Line Status .
attribute.definition: Status of the sales order line at the close of the status date.

attribute.caption: Status Comment
attribute.name: Status Comment .
attribute.definition: Date of the first day in the corresponding fiscal period.
